Public Member Functions

 is_special ($upc)

Detailed Description

WFC style custom store coupons

This class looks for UPC prefix 00499999

The remainder of the UPC is an ID value to look up requirement(s) and discount via the houseCoupons and houseCouponItems tables

Process the UPC

Parameters:
$upc The UPC
$json Keyed array See the Parser class for array format
Returns:
Keyed array See the Parser class for array format
These modules supplement parsing to make UPC handling more customizable. The module will be invoked within a Paser object and hence uses the same return format.
